conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. I came across SS&C Advent and was impressed with the work you're doing in the financial technology space. I'd love to introduce you to our data processing solution, which has helped similar companies like yours streamline their operations and gain valuable insights from their data.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Hi Alex, I'm John, the CTO here. We're always looking for ways to improve our operations, but I have to say, we've got a lot on our plate right now. What makes you think your solution is a good fit for us, and how does it differ from what we're currently using?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, John, our DeepData AI solution uses machine learning algorithms to process large datasets quickly and accurately, which can help you make more informed decisions and stay ahead of the competition. We've seen significant ROI for our clients in the financial services industry, and I think we could do the same for you. We're also integrated with many of the popular portfolio management and accounting systems, so integration would be seamless.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I see. That sounds interesting, but we've recently invested in a new data analytics platform, and I'm not sure we're ready to rip and replace it with something new. Not to mention, our budget for this year is already allocated, and I'm not sure we have the resources to take on a new project like this. Can you tell me more about the cost and what kind of resources would be required for implementation?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand, John. The cost of our solution is competitive with other data processing solutions on the market, and we offer flexible pricing plans to fit your needs. As for resources, we have a dedicated implementation team that would work closely with your team to ensure a smooth transition. However, I would need to discuss the specifics of the pricing and implementation plan with our sales team and get back to you with a customized proposal.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, Alex, but to be honest, this is not a priority for us right now. We're in the middle of a major system upgrade, and our team is already stretched thin. I don't think we could take on another project, no matter how promising it sounds. Maybe we can revisit this conversation in a few months when things have settled down, but for now, I think we're going to have to pass.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand, John. It was great speaking with you, and I appreciate your honesty. I'll make sure to follow up with you in a few months to see if your priorities have changed.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Thank you, Alex, but I think we're going to have to decline. We appreciate the introduction to DeepData AI, but we just can't take on anything new at this time. Please don't follow up, and let's just consider this matter closed.
